_sText:
The creator of the map was 'pennerlord' i give this guy credit to what he has done, but this is a new version of the map.

This is the new deathrun holyshit hardmode v2, there is many changes to this map including a new skybox, more traps, more break floors ect.

//Features:
1. 20 Traps!
2. 35 CTs and 2 Ts = 37 Players
3. Large Map
4. 4 Minigames and 2 Secretarea
5. 5 Secretnades

//The minigames:
1. AWP: Get an AWP and shoot the bastards down ;D
2. Knife: The goal is to knife the other team
3. Bhop: Jump and Run. Goal is to reach the middle island. Than you get a Deagle or a glock
4. Deagle Roulette: Try to kill the other team with one shot
5. Secrets: Try them out ;D

//Changelog:
Secret level (Trap 2) fixed - as on stable4 this trap still didn't work but now works.

Give us feedback!

Have fun and good luck ;)
